name: TimeetcVirtualAssistantservice
0: ”Alexa, ask my virtual assistant to do a task”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my virtual assistant
Developer Terms of Use
des:
I created this Alexa skill because I kept thinking of great tasks for my Virtual Assistant to do whilst my hands were full - like when I was driving or doing the washing up! I've always got Alexa nearby and I decided it would be neat if I could send a task to my Virtual Assistant by speaking it.

If you're a client of Time etc's award-winning Virtual Assistant service you can use this Alexa skill to easily delegate tasks to your Virtual Assistant. To use it just say "Alexa, ask my virtual assistant to do a task" and follow the prompts. Your task will be automatically sent to your Virtual Assistant. Magic!
